On Tue, 30 Apr 2002 bluedrgnkid@... wrote:

> Does anyone have one of the 1997 or somewhere around there Gladiator? If you
> run it in windows 3.11 it will glitch and Money will become somewhere around
> -16777215. It gives you infinite cash, giving you a ultimate character.

At that point, it'd be better to use the cheat. It has less of a chance of
screwing things up, and you don't have to worry about running out.

Not that cheating is good or anything..
